title: Tata Motors sales up 2 pc at 76,766 units in May
description: Tata Motors reported a 2% increase in total wholesales for May, with 76,766 units compared to 74,973 units last year. Domestic sales also grew by 2%, reaching 75,173 units. Passenger vehicle sales, including electric vehicles, rose to 47,075 units from 45,984 units, while commercial vehicle sales increased to 29,691 units from 28,989 units.
